name: Space Worm
description:
SYNOPSIS:

The Space Worm is trying to eat your ship. Destroy it with your missiles. 

CONTROLS:

Standard game-pads are supported

GAME-PLAY:

Kill the Space Worm by shooting it with your missiles. Your missiles are on a delayed launch to assist with hitting your foe. Hitting the Worm makes its segments fall off. When only the head is left the worm dies. Segments can be destroyed but if left onscreen the Score Multiplier increases.
